verses.name: Revelation 20:1
verses.text: And I saw an angel come down from heaven, having the key of the bottomless pit and a great chain in his hand.

verses.name: Revelation 20:2
verses.text: And he laid hold on the dragon, that old serpent, which is the Devil, and Satan, and bound him a thousand years,

verses.name: Revelation 20:3
verses.text: And cast him into the bottomless pit, and shut him up, and set a seal upon him, that he should deceive the nations no more, till the thousand years should be fulfilled: and after that he must be loosed a little season.
